downloadDescription: Get a visual overview of portfolio management responsibilities and status in your organization with this Visio 2010 sample diagram.
detailsSection: Use this Microsoft Visio 2010 template to build a visual portfolio of business functions in your organization. The sample diagram shows how you can use Visio to categorize the different functions by type (for example, application architecture, governance, and application portfolio), identify responsibilities by individual, and track whether a strategy is in place, under development, or to be determined for each area. This sample could also be adapted to show a portfolio of open projects by department or a scorecard of corporate initiatives.
installInstructionSection: Click Download to save the template to your computer.
